sentences.english: Look to my coming at first light on the fifth day. At dawn, look to the east.
sentences.chinese: 第五次天亮时等待我的出现，在黎明时，看着东方。

sentences.english: They packed the vegetables at night and brought them to the market before dawn.
sentences.chinese: 他们在夜里装菜，天亮前运到市场。

sentences.english: This hydraulic system is 100 per cent made in China, " says Wang proudly.
sentences.chinese: “这台液压系统百分百产自中国，”王天亮骄傲地说。

sentences.english: Could you drive me to Enniskerry in the morning?
sentences.chinese: 天亮以后你可以送我去茵思凯瑞吗？

sentences.english: He gets up at the crow of the rooster every day.
sentences.chinese: 天亮了，我听到从某处传来雄鸡的报晓声。

sentences.english: In my old home we used to sit outside all night with the fire.
sentences.chinese: 我们在自己老家的时候，可以围着篝火一夜坐到天亮。

sentences.english: Towards dawn we found ourselves ascending the Nine-Dragon Slope five kilometres from home.
sentences.chinese: 快天亮时，我们已在爬离家五公里远的九龙坡了。

sentences.english: That night we partied until dawn.
He recomposed the editorial till dawn.
Day came. I found the boat and rowed back across the lake.
sentences.chinese: 天亮了，我找到了那只船并划了回去。

sentences.english: Neither of us made a sound and the Cat didn't want to get off the bed until the sun came up.
sentences.chinese: 我和猫咪都不出声，直到天亮了它才肯下床。

sentences.english: Finally I rise, change my clothes, and go to the bathroom to wash my face.
sentences.chinese: 天亮后，我换了衣服，到了浴室梳洗。

sentences.english: Before the night was over, I planned to taste the gin on her lips.
sentences.chinese: 我的计划是在天亮以前在她的唇边品尝酒香。

sentences.english: Before dawn, the constellation Perseus – radiant point of the Perseid meteor shower – is close to overhead.
sentences.chinese: 天亮之前，英仙座流星雨的流星将接近头顶上空。

sentences.english: When day appeared the serpents retired, and I came out of the cave trembling.
sentences.chinese: 当天亮时蟒蛇回去休息了，我颤抖的从山洞出来。

sentences.english: The jail break apparently occurred in the pre-dawn hours Friday.
sentences.chinese: 这场越狱是发生在星期五快天亮的时候。

definition: midnight/in the middle of the night
in the evening/when night falls/towards evening/at night fall/at dusk
the whole night/all through the night
